_json.gridTitle: 25 Foolproof Summer Hairstyles to Try When It's Boiling Outside
_json.description: Trendy Tousle - By adding edgy texture, a short cut can be made over for summer. While longer bangs would normally fall on the forehead, giving them some lift keeps them off the face, making the look ideal for hot days. Before blow drying hair, apply a volumizing mousse to the front pieces. Then use your fingers to pull hair away from your face as you dry it. Once strands are dry, apply pomade to the front pieces, lifting and pulling them upward and to the side.
